name: Brain Physics Puzzle
description:
The Incredible Physics Experiments is puzzle game from the creators of the Quiz of Knowledge game


Brain Physics Puzzle is a physics game where there is no single solution for passing the level. In any level you are invited to find your unique solution.

If You like classical logic games here is one you were looking for.


The early levels will teach you how to play the game and go through some basic concepts.
Just use you brain! :)


The game is designed in a 2D world and have accurate and realistic physics.

INTUITIVE CONTROLS
The interface is simple and convenient. Just use your touch.

REALISTIC PHYSICS
The game is designed in a 2D world with accurate and realistic physics.

NICE GRAPHICS
Really enjoyable and lovely arts.
